storyName: In the Name of a Miracle
storyInfo: The infected Cautus has not died. She's been saved, though she does not know by whom, and taken to a place beyond her comprehension. Three years after the Londinium incident, many operators on Rhodes Island set out to provide reinforcements to various locations.

attributes.content: Bells...? Why am I hearing them ring from all directions?
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: Her voice is so soft that it does not even echo off the walls.
Whenever the foggy light comes, lots of tiny holes appear in the walls, opening and closing, breathing. When the light disappears, the walls turn white and silent.
That light... is very different from the Holy City's light that the Bishop talked about...
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: (Unknown language) That light is a simulated F spectrum.
attributes.name: Cold Voice

attributes.content: I can hear you. How can I see you?
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: She presses her nails to the wall. It feels warm and soft, as if she's touching someone else's fingertips—
—so she places her whole palm against the wall, pressing closely to the wall's fine patterns and textures.
Wherever her hand moves, the patterns stretch along with it, as if they're quietly guiding her by the hand.
You're... responding to me?
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: She runs forward for a bit, and the wall extends with her, leading her.
There are so many doors and so many different paths here. Where do they all lead?
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: The Cautus stops walking. She sees a 'god' standing in midair, a short distance in front of her. Its silhouette is massive.

The surface of the god's body carries a murky sheen, unlike that of any metal. It nimbly arranges a vast array of glowing fragments into patterns. As the patterns change, the fragments shift color in turn.
But the girl notices that there is no halo on the 'god's' head. The midair colossus completely ignores her, gliding past without hesitation.
Another similar being approaches and stops in front of her.
It seems to be asking her a question.
I don't understand what you're saying.
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: The 'god' is quiet for a moment. Then it switches from its own language to another one and continues talking.
(Unknown language) Your use of language is primitive.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: The 'god' extends its supple limbs to cover the Cautus's head. The Cautus nervously shuts her eyes.
(Unknown language) There's no need to fear. I am analyzing your brain frequency and will upload it to Anseta.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: Language. You. Sufficient to communicate.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: ...Not yet vectorized, extrapolation, deduction. Language, temporary adjustment. Resonance, necessary.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: I... can't understand you. Can you understand me?
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: Indubitably.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: —Then are you... God?
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: The Cautus nervously asks the question that she is most desperate for an answer to.
'God', question. Definition, necessary.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: The Bishop says that God is the embodiment of the Law and the Lord of the Holy City, who protects the sick and the dearly departed. But these things that he says were never recorded in the history books.
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: Forsake, god.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: God, not, necessary.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: If you aren't God, then who rescued me? Why have I been brought here?
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: Or is this Kingdom Come? Are you here to guide me into the Kingdom?
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: Questions. Too many.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: Resonance, lacking. Communication, inefficient.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: Raydistorter. I.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: Partial answer. Show you.
attributes.name: Mechanical Lifeform

attributes.content: The being who calls itself 'Raydistorter' uses its limbs to draw a window in the air and drag it to the nearest wall. The image in the porthole quickly fades from view.
A pale, eerie light wells up from nowhere, flooding the entire window. The image sharpens gradually—and the Cautus girl looks out the 'window'.
A shattered sphere floats in the dark expanse of space, dotted with countless stars. It is frozen at the moment of death.
All the pasts that have not had time to be told shatter into dust and are cast into the frozen void.
The dust particles find each other and circle around the former garden. They clump together into rings that float in the air.
The Cautus girl and Raydistorter 'sail' atop these dust rings into the dead silence.
We see. Sail. Salvage.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: You, shudder. Fear?
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: The faraway things, the twinkling things, they look like eyes. It's really scary.
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: They're just stars, but they feel alien to me. There are too many of them; they are too close, too bright.
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: You're not scared?
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: Fear is unnecessary.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Fear, too limiting, too inadequate, to describe.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: The Cautus looks through the window and sees that tiny holes have appeared in the walls of the ship.
A white light appears somewhere far, far in the distance. It starts growing, and growing until it covers up almost the entire window.
The blinding light caresses the surface of the land of death, covering and hiding everything from any would-be watchful eyes.
The Cautus girl looks directly at the light, as a fear is continually invading her heart, a fear she does not understand.
It's the pale light of a dying star.
A dead planet still orbits the star, and the great ship clinging to the star ring must endure its light and its wailing, again and again, without end.
See, yes?
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Only, grave. No, 'Holy City'.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Only, cycles, only, laws. No... 'gods'.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Universe. Welcome.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: You. Traveler. Name?
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Hierda.
attributes.name: Confused Individual

attributes.content: 'I don't know when it started, but the nickname the clerics used to tease me with became my name.'

attributes.text: \n\nUnlocking restricted-access project: PRTS Repaired Audio Log #0422
The dust has settled in Londinium, but hopes for peace in Victoria seem dim.
How much time do we have? I know you're listening, PRTS.
I need you to do everything you can to restore monitoring the Cradle Process, in the middle decks' under-development area.
And... prepare to grant Closure access to my permissions.
There's a lot left to do. How much will I manage myself?
\n\nAdministrator, do you want to unlock the next classified log?

attributes.content: <p=1>Rhodes Island Landship</> <p=2>Summer, 1101</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.text: Three years after the Londinium incident

attributes.content: (Sliding quickly)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: (Proudly claiming credit)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: Good work. It seems like Closure and Mechanist's upgrades were effective.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: (Spins happily)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: Hey. The repair work on this sector is nearly complete.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: She feels a small body make contact with her back, hugging her neck and giggling.
Alanna knows the giggle well. Sometimes, it makes her happy, and sometimes it makes her anxious.
She takes the girl she loves so much up on her back.
Potlid, I smell cream stew!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Lanns, you're going to ruin the surprise!
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: It smells too good! I couldn't help myself!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You sure are happy. I guess the Doctor agreed?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Yes! I saw there was an opening for volunteer work in the Rim Billiton office, and I signed up as soon as I could.
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: The food I cook now can't cure a miner's Oripathy, sure, but our Rhodes Islander friends can, and I can fill their stomachs.
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: If Savage and Ray hadn't vouched for me, the Doctor might've rejected my application on the spot.
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: Well, it's my responsibility as your guardian to accompany you, obviously.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Savage and Ray are with me. No worries!
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: But even when I'm not around, you still have to eat right, Lanns. I've left a full week's worth of soups of the day in the kitchen—all your favorite flavors.
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: My colleagues in Logistics will keep an eye on you for me.
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: Haha. You're the boss, Potlid.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But will you really be able to stand leaving your friends?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: (Exaggerated nod)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: Yes. The Beepy's also a good friend of mine.
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: But lots of the people I know have applied to serve as backup in this place or that, and I'm not about to fall behind.
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: Everyone's looking forward to touring our new home after the mission is over. Lanns, you promised me that Rhodes is gonna look even more beautiful once the renovations are done!
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: (Shhh—Of course, I peeked at Closure's blueprints before.)
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Also...
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: Also?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I was already brave enough to say goodbye to my family and set off on a long journey, just like my dad did. Lanns, you just wait for my return!
attributes.name: Warmy

attributes.content: A giant cookie? Is this from Ceobe?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Lots of operators getting ready to head out to support posts got cookies.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: 'You gotta eat good when you're traveling.' Kay was really firm with me on that.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I just wonder if she's gonna end up eating most of the cookies before she gets to share them.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I set it up with Vulcan to bake a batch of cookies as quickly as possible, so Kay could pass them out to all the operators going on field missions.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: When the time comes, I'll have Sonya go with Kay to distribute them.
attributes.name: Istina
Zima
attributes.content: Why—

attributes.name: Zima
attributes.content: Forget it. I'll just drag Leto along with me.
Haha. I'm fine as long as you give me the honey drink you owe me once we get there.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: With a drink in my hand, I'm at your command, General Zima!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Gah. What a headache. All this talking-to-people shit... This is Natalya's work.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: But Rosa can't be everywhere at once—she has a lot of specific plans to go over with Amiya too, you know.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: This trip's going to be a bit more trouble than usual—after all, we're going to—
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (In Ursine) Ursus.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Or did you give the task of planning with Amiya to Rosa because you were afraid you couldn't do it?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Who said I couldn't do it? It's just—
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Ursus, the place they all left together.
So much time has passed since then. Zima believes they are ready to go back and face the place once more.
Gummy, what's wrong with your hand?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: N-Nothing, Zima. It's just a little sore, is all. We had them baking too many cookies. The bakers in the canteen got worn out.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Even Kay, waiting right outside the door, had to get dragged in to help like a good girl.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Don't worry about me, Zima. She wants to fill the bellies of the operators who took good care of her and are now leaving home. I feel the same way.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: We'll do our part as well.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Anyways, Natalya also needs to spend some time—
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: You need help? Count me in.
See, Little Cub? Look what I can whip up in the kitchen.
attributes.name: Dur-nar

attributes.content: Instructor Dur-nar?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: The Doctor showed me your application. I took the liberty of applying to travel with you—as your 'guardian.'
attributes.name: Dur-nar

attributes.content: Truth is, the Doctor was too worried about sending you back. I'm worried enough myself.
attributes.name: Dur-nar

attributes.content: Zima...?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Welcome!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Rosa, the Doctor didn't want to approve your application, at first.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Medical assessed all of you and recommended that we be a bit more careful with your itinerary.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, in the end, the Doctor respected our wishes?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: That's because of Zima.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She burst into the Doctor's office and vowed to protect you, promising your safe return to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Just like before.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I kept them alive in Chernobog, I got us through it. This time's no different.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.options: This isn't just about your safety.;This encounter with Ursus will be very different from before.

attributes.content: Natalya and I have it worked out—If we operate under her family's Rostov Industries, we'll have an easier time moving around.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.options: I'm not worried about your status.;Rhodes Island has ways to deal with things like that.
The assessment says you aren't fully prepared yet.
There are other logistics tasks you can choose.;There are always other ways you can help Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: We're all nervous about going back, at least a bit. But we can't keep hiding from it.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: This isn't some 'journey home for self-healing.' We looked over the risks and volunteered because we think we're a good fit for operations in Ursus.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: We decided to call Rhodes Island our home a long time ago.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: So I can guarantee I'll bring them back home, safe and sound.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Sonya has always been braver than me.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Amiya, as far as the details of our collaboration with Rostov Industries, I'd appreciate it if Dr. Kal'tsit and the Doctor could take a closer look.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I believe this will only be beneficial to our operations.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Consider it done, Rosa.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: However, I still recommend that you avoid conducting any operations in Chernobog for now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ursus is still patrolling the area as closely as ever, and your identities are still an issue.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We'll stay in contact with the ship—there are still many aspects of the Ursine operation that will be up to you to assess.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Have a safe trip, Rosa.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The ship will be sending additional Logistics and Medical staff to accompany you—not only to support your operation, but also to explore the possibility of establishing a permanent office in Ursus.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: By the way, someone else came to find me after your travel plans were announced. She hopes to join you on your journey.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: (Stomach growling)
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Gummy, put the pot down. You eat your fill first!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Huh? I haven't gone hungry in a very long time.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: (Stomach growling)
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Hehe. Maybe I was just too busy today and forgot to eat, Istina.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: You and Zima are here, so I'll be fine.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Then get to eating, you hear me?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Open wide, Gummy.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Mm-mm, I'm full, Leto!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Come to think of it, do you have anything you need us to bring, Zima? Personal thingies? I brought some big crates with me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well, let's bring the guitar Natalya gave me. Don't want her asking about it later.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Anything else, just leave it at home. Not like we're never coming back.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Leto, didn't you say we weren't taking anything?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: That reminds me—I've got some junk to give to someone. Mind if we swing by Kjerag on the way, Sonya?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Should be fine. I'll submit my travel plan to the Doctor.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Excuse me, might I join you on your trip to Ursus?
attributes.name: Resolute Voice

attributes.content: Sorry, I know this request is sudden...
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: But I...
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Sonya, let Zoya come with us.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: This rescue mission will be a long one. We can take care of each other along the way.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: You already know, Natalya?
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: I talked to Rosa about it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Haha. Don't sweat it, Zoya. This isn't our first joint trip.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Ceobe, wait, that cookie is still a bit raw in the middle!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No! Stop her! She'll give herself a tummyache!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: (Politely stops her)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: I'm gonna be late!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: (Spins angrily)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: Kay made so many cookies.
Those cookies should go to very, very good people.
Lots of wonderful people are setting out on a journey. They took good care of Kay at home, so Kay wants to make sure they don't go hungry.
That's the deal.
Doctor, the copy rooms on each floor have been packed with people these past few days.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: This round of field deployments, going out to so many different regions, is the perfect opportunity for us to pick up local souvenirs—the wishlists everyone's been making are long enough to start a whole Terran Expo.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: In the past, Closure has suggested that the Procurement Department make unified purchases for the operators, but I rejected the idea.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let's keep the spirit of the tradition alive. Procurement will be sending out a notice soon regarding reimbursement.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you need me to bring you back anything from my trip to Victoria?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Kal'tsit shakes her head. She looks at the cookies Folinic is holding with a bit of suspicion.
Ceobe shoved these cookies at me just now.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: She just made a gigantic mess in the kitchen, and Amiya is still trying to help clean it up.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Poor Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Folinic, you're going to have your hands full on this trip to Victoria.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In addition to recovering data from several offices in the ducal territories, you'll have to monitor Na Saoirsí and Reed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You'll have to coordinate with all the different offices to provide her as much support as possible.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: And Londinium?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Let Heidi know that we are temporarily delaying our return to the ship for debriefing. Ever since Londinium's Parliament restored contact with the outside world, it has resumed collecting messages from the Core nations.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The intelligence network that Heidi has been cultivating is extremely important. This is also why I am sending you to provide support.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So overall, things aren't really that great? I see. I'll pay close attention to all of this.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Folinic, you need to take it easier.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wha?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You have a habit of overloading yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I saw your itinerary. You're stretching yourself too thin. I deleted a few of the tasks.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Try not to dwell on the things you fear—and don't try and force yourself to take control of them, either.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Folinic, I never expected you to be like your mother... or me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't support encouraging those who have experienced suffering to forget the hatred and violence they've endured. If we want to build a better future, we mustn't surrender.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Try to slow down your pace a bit, Folinic. Wanting to have more control over your life is good, but getting all anxious about it is just tantamount to self-torture.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's a long road to Victoria, but I need you to remember the smile you had when you first walked in this room.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is my one and only requirement for you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will remember that.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'll pick out a souvenir for you myself when I get to Victoria.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Farewell, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Red, you don't need to hide.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I was afraid you would be angry.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: You told me not to be sad about Siracusa... but I made you sad.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I don't want to leave Rhodes Island this time. I'm afraid you will force me.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I haven't prepared the transfer order for S.W.E.E.P. yet, Red.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Stay here on standby. Ascalon's orders will arrive soon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After we receive the orders, can I stay by your side?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Yes. Didn't you arrive some time ago?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes. I arrived a while ago.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Aunt Jemma and Mum prepared these canned golden radishes for me to hand out to my colleagues.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Sorry. There might be a few too many of them. Should we maybe store them in the kitchen first?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: There's a veritable mountain of cans here.

attributes.content: I'll leave them with you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: All this stuff happened all of a sudden. It's been too long since I've been home. Mum's stockpile of canned goods is getting out of control. She just keeps dumping them on me over and over.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: Didn't you just tell me they were prepared specifically for our colleagues?

attributes.content: Gah... Yes. Right.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Anyways, they're all mine. I'll decide how they're used.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Doctor, might I trouble you to help me distribute these to our colleagues, when you see them? Warmy's on a tight schedule, so I don't have time to do it myself.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Oh, right. The two cans with names on them... I saved them for you and Amiya. Don't give them out by mistake!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: They look more or less the same.

attributes.content: —You... Of course they're not the same!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Oh right. I'll also need to take thirty cans on my own trip.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: No. As gifts.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Warmy and Ray have an old friend, Jerry. Ever since he married Keira, his career has really taken off.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I saw the last photo he sent. His family has been blessed with a quite a litter of kids lately. Warmy made plans with us to stop and visit them on the way.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: And we haven't really changed much, eh? Well, Amiya sure does seem like she's matured a lot, ever since she returned from Kazdel.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: Please take good care of Warmy and Ray.;Please take care of yourself as well.

attributes.content: I'm well aware of the situation in Rim Billiton. I'll make sure they're cared for.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Don't worry, Doctor.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I look forward to seeing you again after the field missions are complete.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Still, this field assignment covers a pretty wide area—I'm afraid it'll be quite a while before I can sleep soundly in my own bed again.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.options: Don't worry. Rhodes Island will wait for you to return.

attributes.content: Righto!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Keep the lights on for me, Doctor.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hey. What are you still doing here?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I just thought of something. We still haven't been given our medicine/health maintenance manuals yet. We need this guidance so that we can remember our health regimens.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I mean, this is going to be a long trip abroad. Will we all remember to eat our meals and take our medicines?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The medic operators will take care of all that. Why are you worried about it?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But we often do forget to take proper care of ourselves. You yourself, Lava, don't you forget to take your food rations with you, sometimes?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I... uhh... meh... whatever.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Then there's the other members of A1. The squad is going to be taking on some dangerous tasks. Kroos has to go on a long trip all by herself. Will they be okay?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ugh... Enough already! Will you quit treating them like children?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: We've been at this for so long. We're all adults already!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I know... I get it...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's just that—leaving a place I've spent so many years with everyone, day in and day out… and not knowing when I'll be back—it's a lot to take in.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I just feel a bit... empty inside.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't worry. We'll be back.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is dealing with some stuff right now. I trust the Doctor, Dr. Kal'tsit, and Amiya can handle it all.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: All we have to do is complete our own tasks and be patient.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is our home, and we're not gonna lose our home. No matter what happens, we'll be back.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Someday.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: We'll be together again.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Your body temp hasn't come down. It seems like the old cocktail of drugs is no longer effective.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: However, your metabolic rate has not been impacted too much. After the concentration of the old drugs in your bloodstream goes down, I'll administer some new medications.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: These new drugs will decrease your pain threshold, but don't worry, I'll up your pain meds.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Calm Infected

attributes.content: There are a few new empty beds?
attributes.name: Calm Infected

attributes.content: They left yesterday. Don't worry. They've just been transferred elsewhere for more targeted temporary treatment.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: By the way, a few people left some notes for you. They're in your bedside drawer.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Your condition is rather unusual, and we should keep you in a controlled treatment environment. Staying here with me under my observation is the best option.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Okay. Thank you.
attributes.name: Calm Infected

attributes.content: What are you looking at, Chloe?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: There are little circles on the ceiling that keep spinning. Looking at them makes me feel safe.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: The crystals are still interfering with your vision. My next surgery will be an attempt to remove the crystals near your retinas.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Every time I stare at them, they look like they've crept just a bit closer. It's like they're talking to me.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Can you hear them?
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: (Closes eyes) Their sound... it's like that old bell I used to hear.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: You mean the one you told me about before? From the bell tower in your hometown?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: There's more than just one bell tower. I was on a quest to repair all of them, and had already repaired quite a few... when they were all destroyed by cannon fire.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: I reached out to the operators we've got in Victoria—they looked into it for you. The town's been rebuilt, and the locals even repaired that old bell.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: That's great news! Now that the bell's tolling again, life can continue on. Quite a relief, isn't it?
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Warfarin double-checks the instrument readings one last time, then injects the prepared medicine into the IV system.
The buzzing of the instruments mixes together with the noise of the IV system and Chloe's occasional gasps of pain.
Dr. Warfarin, how many different types of medicine have we tried over the last three years?
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Let me worry about that. All your vital indicators have stabilized. That's what's really important here.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Before I contracted Oripathy, I often cared for infected soldiers in the bell tower. I know exactly what it means when the crystals start spreading across your skin.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Chloe tries to move the muscles in her face, but the tiny spikes embedded in her skin twist her expression. Her wounds split open, and bright beads of blood begin to seep out.
(Wry smile) You see? They won't even let me smile.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: As a doctor, I cannot guarantee outcomes. I can only promise that every medic in Rhodes Island will provide you the best possible care.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Thank you, Dr. Warfarin.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: I just... miss my hometown.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: This report, it—!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: The first time I saw this patient's charts, I thought there was some kind of error in the data then too.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: But we checked the data several times, and it was correct.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: By all logic, no patient with this high a Cell-Originium Assimilation rate should still show any signs of life.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: It goes against everything we know about Oripathy.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And yet, the Originium is keeping the patient alive, in a way no one could have predicted.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Some of her internal organs have completely crystallized, but they're actually functioning more efficiently and stably than those of previous patients we've seen.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: I haven't figured out what's causing this condition yet, but based on the data—the more her infection progresses, the healthier she seems… and the more pain she's in.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: We've never seen a case like this before. This may be some kind of new mutated form of Oripathy. If we can make some sort of medical breakthrough while administering her treatment...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Maybe these people we rescued from Victoria really can bring a few miracles to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Warfarin
